comment.author: 61449747@N02
comment._content: Uhh... are you sure this isn't from 1949? I believe that inaugurations are always in odd-numbered years and elections are in even-numbered ones.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi NGarb114,

You are correct Harry Truman's inauguration was in 1949, not 1948.  Thanks helping us correct that mistake!
 
Kristin (U.S. National Archives)
